mapper.select: SELECT cols.COLUMN_ID AS columnId, cols.column_name AS columnName, CASE WHEN cols.data_type = 'NVARCHAR2' THEN cols.data_type || '(' || cols.data_length / 2 || ')' WHEN cols.data_type = 'NUMBER' THEN CASE WHEN cols.DATA_SCALE = 0 THEN cols.data_type || '(' || cols.DATA_PRECISION || ')' ELSE cols.data_type || '(' || cols.DATA_PRECISION || ',' || cols.DATA_SCALE || ')' END WHEN cols.data_type = 'CHAR' THEN CASE WHEN cols.data_length = 1 THEN 'CHAR' ELSE cols.data_type || '(' || cols.data_length || ')' END WHEN cols.data_type = 'DATE' THEN cols.data_type ELSE cols.data_type || '(' || cols.data_length || ')' END AS dataType, comm.comments AS comments, CASE WHEN pk.column_name IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' END AS isPri, CASE WHEN cols.nullable = 'N' THEN 'Y' END AS isNotNull, cols.DATA_DEFAULT AS defaultVal FROM user_tab_columns cols LEFT JOIN user_col_comments comm ON cols.table_name = comm.table_name AND cols.column_name = comm.column_name LEFT JOIN (SELECT cols.table_name, cols.column_name FROM user_constraints cons, user_cons_columns cols WHERE cons.constraint_type = 'P' AND cons.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name AND cons.owner = cols.owner) pk ON cols.table_name = pk.table_name AND cols.column_name = pk.column_name WHERE cols.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY cols.column_id

SELECT cols.column_name AS columnName, cols.data_type AS dataType, DATA_PRECISION AS numPre, DATA_SCALE AS numSca, comm.comments AS comments, CASE WHEN pk.column_name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isPri FROM user_tab_columns cols LEFT JOIN user_col_comments comm ON cols.table_name = comm.table_name AND cols.column_name = comm.column_name LEFT JOIN(SELECT cols.table_name, cols.column_name FROM user_constraints cons, user_cons_columns cols WHERE cons.constraint_type = 'P' AND cons.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name AND cons.owner = cols.owner) pk ON cols.table_name = pk.table_name AND cols.column_name = pk.column_name WHERE cols.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY cols.column_id
